mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arnoullet, Olivier, approximately 1486-1567

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: On les vend a Lyon cheulx Oliuier Arnoullet
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colophon: Imprime nouuellement a Lyon sur le rosne par Oliuier Arnoullet. Et furèt acheuez le xxv. de feburier. Mil.ccccc.xxxi.
Attributed to Pierre Gringore. CF. Brunet, t. 3, col. 1753-1754.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: M. Lortic. Bookplate of Jean Paul Barbier. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 708.
